# README

Materials for evaluating TBERF oyster restoration success. Raw data are in `data/raw` and was processed in `R/dat_proc.R`.  All data can be joined by the common key `id`.  

### Site metadata

```{r}
data(sitdat)
head(sitdat)
str(sitdat)
```

### Water quality data

```{r}
data(wqmdat)
head(wqmdat)
str(wqmdat)
```

### Oyster data

```{r}
data(oysdat)
head(oysdat)
str(oysdat)
```
